column4: I'm running ubuntu 7.10  grphic env special effects doesn't work my video is "intel" is it possible to enable the visual effects
by any chance are you using Intel GMA965?
I don't know but there may be problems right?
the only problem is that XV video doesn't work. you can easily fix this by going to gstreamer-properties, and setting your video output to something not XV
actually I've followed your recommendations but when I try to enable them nothing happens
desktop effects could not be enabled
try doing compiz --replace on a terminal and watch it's output
shrug, not sure what's wrong then. It worked for me.
